item.description:
Come on in and play a match or two. The Relentless Dragon was formerly Silver Dragon and does offer tournaments as well.

This group is for casual play and to meet new people. If you have any questions or need directions, please e-mail us or call 603-883-1116
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask for Jeff, it's a small place

group.name: Greater Nashua Magic: The Gathering Meetup Group

item.name: Greather Nashua Magic: The Gathering Meetup
